channel.title: Motivation on Vig Venkat
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation on Vig Venkat

item.title: A 24 year old's struggle to learn Music
item.description: Firstly listen to the below wonderful piece composed by Ludovico Einaudi Did you notice the talent? The involvement? The fingers moving effortlessly with absolute passion for the tune? The background orchestra supporting like pillars of a beautiful monument? The violins and cellos. This is a thing of a beauty. Now this is one beautiful example of a sincere and a passionate work. Isn’t it? I am a 24 year old aspiring Keyboard student.
